answerText: The Screwtape Letters[10] The author of The Screwtape Letters is probably better known for the fantasy series The Chronicles of Narnia.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Washington, Dartmouth B, GW A | 7 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this satirical novel by about an eponymous devil who holds a position in the bureaucracy of Hell and is trying to prevent the Patient from converting to Christianity.
